pages.text: $(li)The Hay Block is a new decorative block that can be used to save $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/wheat)Wheat$(/l) in a more efficient way.$(br)$(li)It can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/target)Target$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:pets/supplementaries/fodder)Fodder$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l)$(/l) too.
$(li)Fall damage is greatly reduced when falling on this block.
